generateGroups() - Method in class controller.GroupController
Method for generating groups Iterates through the clubs that have been added to the tournament and divides them into two list according to their nationality It then randomizes the order to make the draw unpredictable Then the groups are generated, with the requirements of 1 foreign and 3 norwegian teams
generateGroups() - Static method in class controller.GUIController
